document.full_text: the killing of osama bin laden sharply boosted president barack obama's image, improving americans' views of his leadership and his efforts to fight terrorism, a reuters/ipsos poll released on tuesday found.
document.title: u.s. views of obama improve with bin laden death: reuters/ipsos poll
lines_and_colors: the killing of osama bin laden sharply boosted president barack obama's image, improving americans' views of his leadership and his efforts to fight terrorism, a reuters/ipsos poll released on tuesday found.
